Header: Army Personnel Help Save Lives by Donating Blood
Content: A group 20 Other Ranks of the Security Force Headquarters - Central (SFHQ-Cen) donated blood during a programme, held at Bandarawela Dharmashoka Central College premises on Thursday (13). Responding to a request made by the Principal, the Commander, Security Forces - Central, Major General Rukmal Dias directed the troops for this worthy cause.
